titles.title: District of Columbia Local Juror Non-Discrimination Act of 2023
District of Columbia Local Juror Non-Discrimination Act of 2023
To amend title 11, District of Columbia Official Code, to prohibit the exclusion of individuals from service on a District of Columbia jury on account of sexual orientation or gender identity.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Accountability.

bill.summary:
District of Columbia Local Juror Non-Discrimination Act of 2023
This bill specifies that an individual may not be excluded or disqualified from serving on a grand or petit jury in the District of Columbia because of their sexual orientation or gender identity.
